attributes.action: take serious steps to warn the EU that our former Prime Minister could use his considerable powers of charm and use of terminological inexactitudes to lead the whole of Europe into a similar mess that Britain is now in.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that most citizens in Europe do not have first hand experience of the actual outcome of policies that were introduced by Mr Blair and they need to wise up before similar disastrous actions are commenced in Europe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
